thread.section_title: Hotel Romance Malesherbes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming and modern
thread.title_full: Charming and modern - Review of Hotel Romance Malesherbes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mikb
title: Charming and modern
text:
First, I love the fast wifi. I rely so much on it when i travel so when it's not working or it's DSL speed, it makes the whole experience miserable. Good job on that
The rooms were somewhat small (but expected based on the hotel *** rating) but clean and well appointed. I like the breakfast room and the continental seemed pretty good but didn't have time to sit down for breakfast the 2 mornings I was there (although i did enjoy the orange juice). I'll be back.
